attributes.action: Split Screen in Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you get to a certain bit in the game,were Raiden has a face off with Vamp and you have to use the Railgun to hold of the Suicide Gekko.
The Screen cuts in two and you can see Raiden and Vamp having there face of.
And for anyone who says "Raiden and Vamp are added in and you cannot see them on your own screen."
Turn around as Old Snake and look to the top of Metal Gear Rex,what do you see? YES,Raiden and Vamp having there face off.
Have you looked at the Raiden and Vamp face off lately? I see amazing graphics still while the cameras are facing different directions and no lag?
When I sit and play a game with my brother,we roleplay and talk to each like real soldiers. I like to feel what it would be like to be a two Agents in the middle of battle sneaking though enemy lines. It is great!
